description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. EX-Special Forces, EX-CIA, EX-Mall Security, EX-Assassin and All Time Ladies Man - he's the Derp! He may be the worst pool cleaner in the state but he put Derpville back on the map!
